Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.Main
  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    Starts the application and initializes the loggers. Logger configuration based on global properties in logging.properties. By default java.util.logging.FileHandlers are specified in a static block to allow for the creation of two unique log files. One log captures system activity and the other captures user login activity.
